From securing large capacity venues and coordinating accommodations to managing multi-tier transportation and registration flows, our expert team specializes in high impact conferences, international congresses, and corporate conventions with complex logistics and high attendee volumes.

Connect DMC delivers flawless group travel logistics with private, exclusive transfers and luxury motor coaches that meet top security and sanitation standards. From arrival to departure, dedicated staff handle luggage, airline assistance, and ground operations, while coordinators greet and escort clients personally. We ensure seamless handoffs through vigilant name checks, bus counts, and flight manifest coordination, with early hotel communication for smooth check-in/out.

","snippet-description-more":"

From logoed vehicles to full wraps, branding options are available for corporate groups. Plus, add comforts like chilled beverages, cold towels, branded coconuts, and optional VIP upgrades including limousines and helicopters. We also offer hotel precheckin during airport transfers for ultimate convenience.

Impact","snippet-title":"Building Bridges Between Brands and Communities","snippet-description":"

At Connect DMC, we believe that people are at the heart of every authentic cultural experience. For over 20 years, we've remained deeply committed to the well-being and sustainable development of our local communities in Mexico and the Dominican Republic. Our Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) approach is more than a program; its a purposeful journey. With over 40 hands-on CSR activities available, we invite you to join us in giving back, not just by sharing resources, but by investing time and human connection where it matters most.

","snippet-description-more":"

Certified by Biosphere in both countries, our operations meet global standards for sustainable tourism and responsible destination management. We prioritize local suppliers, artisans, and inclusive hiring to support regional economies, preserve cultural heritage, and promote equity and diversity. Each event is an opportunity to create a lasting impact environmentally, socially, and culturally while offering greener, more conscious options for those seeking to travel with purpose.

Our branding services combine experienced design, creative theming, and local production to ensure every visual touchpoint, from signage and themed dcor to branded collateral and gifts, reflects your brand identity. Our VIP team takes care of every detail so your guests can relax, skip the lines, and begin their journey with peace of mind.

Embark on a unique culinary exploration through the flavors, ambiance, and culture of the Dominican Republic and Mexico with our expertly curated Dine-Arounds. These evening dining programs blend gourmet, local, and fusion cuisine, set in exceptional environments ranging from beachfront terraces and boutique restaurants to elegant hotel venues. Crafted to match the tone, group size, and objectives of your event, our local partnerships, logistical expertise, and eye for detail, create memorable and seamlessly executed dining experiences for every occasion.

Volumes","snippet-title":"Extraordinary Settings for Elevated Events","snippet-description":"

Our portfolio of premier off-site venues transform ordinary events into extraordinary experiences. From oceanfront terraces and historic amphitheaters to private villas and tropical garden settings, each space is carefully selected for its ambiance, exclusivity, and adaptability. Whether you're planning an executive retreat, gala dinner, product launch, or incentive celebration, our expert team curates every detail from venue sourcing and logistics to design and guest experience.

Connection","snippet-description":"

Located on the eastern tip of the Dominican Republic, Punta Cana is famed for its white-sand beaches, turquoise waters, and vibrant spirit that welcomes every traveler with open arms. From high-end leisure escapes to corporate incentive trips and customized group experiences, Connect DMC elevates every journey with curated activities, seamless logistics, and impeccable service. We go beyond the expectedcrafting itineraries that blend relaxation, adventure, and cultural immersion for an experience as dynamic and inspiring as Punta Cana itself.

","snippet-description-more":"

From snorkeling in crystal-clear seas and zip-lining through lush tropical forests to exploring bustling local markets and tasting authentic Dominican cuisine, Punta Cana offers something for every interest. Music, dance, and centuries-old traditions bring culture to life, offering meaningful moments of connection and discovery.

black background with white text"}],"snippet-image-alt-text":"First City of The Americas, Santo Domingo","snippet-tagline":"","snippet-title":"Santo Domingo: Timeless Heritage & Tropical Energy","snippet-description":"

As the oldest city in the New World, Santo Domingo blends centuries of colonial history with the vibrant rhythm of Caribbean life. Located on the southern coast of the Dominican Republic, this dynamic capital is home to the Americas first cathedral, fortress, and paved streetall nestled within the Colonial Zone, a UNESCO World Heritage Site filled with charm and architectural splendor.

","snippet-description-more":"

With the scenic Malecn waterfront, lush parks, cascading waterfalls, and local markets brimming with fresh flavors and handmade crafts, Santo Domingo pulses with culture, color, and coastal beauty. From ocean-view dining to mountain excursions, the capital offers a rich mix of adventure and relaxation.

Ideal for incentive groups, cultural travelers, and corporate retreats, Santo Domingo delivers a compelling mix of heritage, hospitality, and heart. With its deep local expertise, Connect DMC crafts immersive programs that highlight the citys legacy while introducing travelers to its modern energyensuring seamless logistics, memorable experiences, and authentic connections every step of the way.

","snippet-primary-button-text":"","snippet-primary-button-link":"","snippet-secondary-button-text":"Santo Domingo","snippet-secondary-button-link":"https://pages.qwilr.com/collaborate/zyuDqhTCWLcv/tKMxxogwRVGwUzLBj3Xb","EnableClientEdit":true,"IsRecordIncludedInTranslation":false,"IsLanguageRecordInEnglish":false,"IsProtected":"false","IsMemberRoleTaggingEnable":"false"}

black background with white text"}],"snippet-image-alt-text":"The Arch Cabo San Lucas Cabos Beaches Connect DMC, Dominican Republic","snippet-tagline":"","snippet-title":"Los Cabos: Where Desert Luxury Meets Ocean Adventure","snippet-description":"

Nestled at the tip of Mexicos Baja California Peninsula, Los Cabos golden deserts, rugged mountains, and turquoise seas come together to create a captivating atmosphere. With its world-class resorts, iconic landmarks, vibrant culture, and natural beauty, Los Cabos is ideal for travelers seeking luxury, adventure, and authentic Mexican charm.

","snippet-description-more":"

From the art-filled streets of San Jos del Cabo to the lively marina of Cabo San Lucas, the region offers a diverse array of experiences. Whether it's deep-sea fishing, whale watching, desert ATV rides, or private yacht charters, Los Cabos delivers unforgettable moments. Its rich culinary scene, swimmable bays, and renowned golf courses make it especially appealing for leisure travelers, VIPs, and corporate groups.

As a premier destination for incentive travel, retreats, and executive meetings, Los Cabos offers seamless hospitality and scenic venues with a sense of exclusivity. Connect DMC brings this destination to life through expertly curated programsensuring every detail is coordinated, every experience is personalized, and every group leaves with lasting memories. 

","snippet-primary-button-text":"","snippet-primary-button-link":"","snippet-secondary-button-text":"Los Cabos","snippet-secondary-button-link":"https://pages.qwilr.com/collaborate/w3sGh2q1ToC0/E5Pts1O1TcqYEELXavY1","EnableClientEdit":true,"IsRecordIncludedInTranslation":false,"IsLanguageRecordInEnglish":false,"IsProtected":"false","IsMemberRoleTaggingEnable":"false"}

Immersive Coastal Escapes","snippet-description":"

Cancun and the Riviera Maya offer a stunning mix of pristine beaches, rich Mayan history, and lush natural beautyperfect for travelers seeking adventure, relaxation, and cultural immersion. Cancun is known for its turquoise waters, white sands, and vibrant nightlife, while the Riviera Maya enchants with eco-parks and ancient ruins.

","snippet-description-more":"

More than a vacation spot, Cancun is a top choice for corporate events and incentive travel, boasting luxury resorts and modern conference facilities. Whether for meetings or team building, it provides versatile venues and exciting activitiesfrom snorkeling and zip-lining to exploring Mayan sites. Its lively nightlife also offers great opportunities for networking and socializing.

Together, Cancun and the Riviera Maya blend natural beauty with world-class amenities and unique experiences. Connect DMC ensures every trip runs smoothly, with tailored programs that create lasting memories for groups of all sizes.

black background with white text"}],"snippet-image-alt-text":"Puerto Vallarta Beaches","snippet-tagline":"","snippet-title":"Puerto Vallarta: Culture, Adventure & Beachside Luxury","snippet-description":"

Nestled on Mexicos Pacific coast along stunning Banderas Bay, Puerto Vallarta is a destination that effortlessly blends natural beauty, colonial charm, and modern resort luxury. Known for its golden beaches, lush jungle backdrops, and vibrant local culture, the city offers the perfect setting for unforgettable meetings, incentive programs, leisure escapes, and special events.

","snippet-description-more":"

With convenient access via Puerto Vallarta International Airport, robust event infrastructure, and a wide variety of high-end accommodations, this destination is ideal for groups of all sizes. Whether you're planning a corporate retreat, incentive trip, or bespoke celebration, Connect DMC delivers seamless, customized programs shaped by over 25 years of regional expertise.

From the cobblestone streets of the historic Zona Romntica to the pristine waters of the Marietas Islands, Puerto Vallarta invites your group to explore, connect, and be inspired.

Connect DMC is a leading Destination Management Company (DMC) established in 1999, specializing in delivering exceptional services for Incentives, Meetings & Events, as well as Luxury Travel Advisors and Bespoke Travel Designers. With a strong presence in the Dominican Republic and Mexico, Connect DMC offers unparalleled ground services, ensuring seamless experiences for clients.

","snippet-description-more":"

Our mission is to provide premier destination management services, characterized by creativity, innovation, and a deep understanding of the local culture. We are committed to delivering exceptional experiences that exceed client expectations.

Distinction","snippet-description":"

Connect DMC designs exceptional moments across Mexico and the Dominican Republic, where elegance, authenticity, and a deep sense of place come together. Each experience is created for those who value privacy, comfort, and the art of discovery.

From a candlelit dinner on a secluded beach to a private tasting in a historic hacienda or a helicopter ride over dramatic coastlines, every journey reflects a commitment to detail and sophistication.

Our team combines local insight with world class service to create experiences that transcend expectations, immersive, seamless, and unforgettable.
